item.title: Writeup - Least Significant Color
item.description: Bluehens CTF 2023 - Least significant color CTFtime I can’t decide which color is the least significant… red xor green? -azroberts So for this challenge we got an image file provided encoded.png. All we have to know is in the title AND in the description. Before giving the solution, we need to have in mind two things: Least significant bit (LSB) and the representation of an image. Reminder Images An image is basically a 2D list of tuples (R=red, G=green, B=blue) of 3 values.
